dishes.name: Stuffed Artichokes
dishes.description: Stuffed with ricotta, garlic, and all sorts of other deliciousness, these Stuffed Artichokes are a fun and tasty appetizer. Serve these at your next dinner party, and you are sure to receive rave reviews. As a bonus, the artichokes are full of nutrients

dishes.name: Jalapeno Popper Wontons
dishes.description: With a filling that can be made ahead of time and a quick fry time, these jalapeno popper wontons are a quick and easy appetizer. A great finger food as well, these poppers are perfect for parties and game days. Also, if you enjoy a little spice, these wontons are an ideal fit.

dishes.name: Hot Ham and Cheese Party Rolls
dishes.description: Perfect for sharing (or hoarding for yourself!), these hot ham and cheese party rolls are one of the best appetizers and are delicious perfection. The ham, cheese, and pizza dough combine in the oven for a melty, yet crispy ensemble. Best of all, this sandwich recipe, complete with the glaze, can be assembled ahead of time and then baked later.

dishes.name: Meatball Stuffed Buns
dishes.description: A spin on the traditional meatball, these meatball stuffed buns are warm and filling. For down-home comfort, these stuffed buns are a great choice. Trust us – your entire family will be thanking you for making this appetizer.

dishes.name: Sweet Potato Bites
dishes.description: Comprised of just a few simple ingredients, these sweet potato bites with avocado and bacon are a healthier appetizer. The sweet potatoes are thinly sliced and baked into chips and then topped with guacamole and crisp bacon. For a more refined approach to finger foods, this may be one of the best appetizers for you.

dishes.name: Honey Garlic Chicken Skewers
dishes.description: Coated in a tasty marinade of honey, soy sauce, vinegar, ginger, and garlic, these skewers are full of flavor. You also have the option of either baking or grilling them as well. If you are looking for a more substantial appetizer, this is the perfect option.

dishes.name: Garlic Herb Roasted Shrimp
dishes.description: Paired with a homemade cocktail sauce, this garlic-herb roasted shrimp is a step up from the usual cocktail shrimp appetizer. And, with just a 10 minute start to finish prep and cook time, this is an appetizer that is ready in no time flat. Try this recipe next time you have some fresh shrimp on hand.

dishes.name: Parmesan Crusted Tortellini Bites
dishes.description: Fried food is almost always delicious and a crowd favorite. These fried parmesan-crusted tortellini bites take it to the next level, though. They consist of delicious bite-sized tortellini that is filled with cheese, fried, and then dipped in marinara.

dishes.name: Blackened Shrimp Avocado Cucumber Bites
dishes.description: The shrimp are seasoned and seared in a cast-iron pan, and then placed on cucumber slices covered in creamy avocado. A link to a tasty remoulade sauce is also included with this recipe.

dishes.name: Crescent Sausage Bites
dishes.description: Fry up some ground sausage, fold in some cream cheese, and then sandwich between two layers of crescent rolls.

dishes.name: Bacon Crackers
dishes.description: With butter crackers as the base and then a thick layer of candied bacon, this is the perfect finger food appetizer for bacon lovers everywhere.

dishes.name: Firecracker Chicken Meatballs
dishes.description: Sweet, savory, and spicy, these firecracker chicken meatballs are one of the best appetizers and sure to impress.

dishes.name: Loaded Queso Fundido
dishes.description: “Mexican fondue,” this queso has a ton of flavor and is perfect for dipping chips, crackers, and bread.

dishes.name: Bacon Double Cheeseburger Dip
dishes.description: Allow you to experience all the yummy goodness of a bacon cheeseburger in dip form! Perfect for chilly nights

dishes.name: Mac and Cheese Bites
dishes.description: Mac and cheese bites are a great finger food to serve, If you love it, you should try it.

dishes.name: Watermelon, Olive and Feta Salad
dishes.description: The perfect summer salad of melon, olives and feta cheese with toasted pumpkin seeds.

dishes.name: Carrot Salad with Black Grape Dressing
dishes.description: Why buy salad dressings that are full of preservatives, when you can easily make them at home! A quick carrot salad with a freshly made black grape dressing.

dishes.name: BBQ Potato Salad
dishes.description: The good old potato salad with a twist! This one has a cola flavored BBQ sauce as a dressing ingredient. Yes, you're right! A splash of your favorite soft drink is the highlight of the dressing sauce.

dishes.name: Thai Soyabean In Cabbage Cups
dishes.description: If your watching your weight, this low fat salad recipe is your perfect companion! A mash up of soy granules and oriental flavours, served in cabbage cups.

dishes.name: Asian Sesame Chicken
dishes.description: A healthy soul's delight! Make yourself a simple, speedy and satisfying meal by creating a salad of chicken strips, greens, almonds, sesame seeds and asparagus. Dress it up with some soya sauce, vinegar and chilly oil.

dishes.name: Cucumber, Black Olive and Mint Salad
dishes.description: A chunky salad of cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, peppery mint leaves drizzled with a black olive sauce.

dishes.name: Caesar Salad
dishes.description: This classic Caesar salad is not just easy to make but the perfect mix of cream and crunch.

dishes.name: Tomato Olive Salad
dishes.description: Fresh crunchiness and juiciness of tomatoes and taste of olives is enough to make you drool over this amazing salad recipe.

dishes.name: Cedar-Plank Salmon
dishes.description: A big salmon fillet always feels like a festive main course, especially when it's cooked on a cedar grilling plank, so it picks up a whisper of smoky flavor.

dishes.name: Braised Chicken Legs With Grapes and Fennel
dishes.description: There's nothing wrong with defaulting to chicken when you're trying to think of dinner party ideas. The key is to select a truly special chicken recipe, like this easy sweet-and-spicy braise, made with ribbons of fennel and juicy table grapes. You'll want to have a loaf of bread on the side for sopping up the sauce.

dishes.name: Seared Scallops With Brown Butter and Lemon Pan Sauce
dishes.description: Scallops are always a stunner, but these are dead simple to make: Juice lemons. Spoon out capers. Heat pan. Cook scallops. Make sauce in same pan. Serve.

dishes.name: Grilled Pork Spareribs With Soda Bottle Barbecue Sauce
dishes.description: Barbecue brisket is a whole ordeal, but you can get rich, meaty flavor faster if you focus on tender pork spareribs. These have two sauce options, made with your choice of Coca-Cola or ginger ale.

dishes.name: Marinated Chicken Breasts With Grilled Pineapple Relish
dishes.description: Chicken breasts don't have to be boring. Gather friends around the grill for this extra-flavorful meal, enhanced with grilled pineapple. Marinate the chicken in advance and you have one of those perfectly summery, easy dinners that's sure to impress.

dishes.name: Tamarind-Glazed Black Bass With Coconut-Herb Salad
dishes.description: Dinner recipes don't always feel like a celebration, but this one does. Two whole fish are brushed with a tamarind and honey glaze, then roasted for just about 20 minutes. It's easier than roast chicken, and the presentation is truly fabulous.

dishes.name: Stuffed Eggplants and Zucchini in a Rich Tomato Sauce
dishes.description: In this recipe, summer produce gets stuffed with spiced ground lamb and cooked in an oniony tomato sauce. Top it off with crispy garlic, herbs, and yogurt.

dishes.name: Instant Pot Lamb Haleem
dishes.description: Pakistani haleem is a warmly spiced, satisfyingly thick stew made from long-simmered lentils, barley, and bone-in chunks of lamb or goat. This version is designed for the Instant Pot, which cuts out hours of simmering and stirring.

dishes.name: Mango lassi
dishes.description: Mango, yogurt and milk combine in creamy harmony making those sweltering afternoons almost something to look forward to.

dishes.name: Pina colada
dishes.description: Just looking at the drink brings you closer to a beach and sipping this mixture of coconut milk, pineapple juice and rum

dishes.name: Coconut water
dishes.description: You can eat its flesh raw or flaked and cook with its oil, but the best way to ingest the star of so many tropical scenes is to stick a straw inside and drink.

dishes.name: Champagne
dishes.description: Champagne is the diamond of the drink world, taking its place on the podium as the beverage to have when celebrating pretty much anything.

dishes.name: Chocolate Milkshake
dishes.description: The amount of energy spent trying to slurp this thick sludge up the straw must burn off at least a few of those calories.

dishes.name: Lemonade
dishes.description: This summer refresher, first documented in Egyptian writings around 1,500 years ago, turns kids into happy angels and adults into happy kids. If you can ignore the five spoons of sugar in your glass, it can even be considered healthy: it's been said to aid digestion, relieve heartburn and control diarrhea and constipation.

dishes.name: Coca-Cola
dishes.description: The drink has gone through various manifestations, including Diet, Cherry, Lemon and Zero, but it's the original, with a brain-freezing, nasal-passage-penetrating kick that keeps 'em coming back for more.

dishes.name: Water
dishes.description: The mere addition of bubbles transforms plain old H2O into a stylish 'beverage', conferring upon you instant elan.

dishes.name: Chocolate-Mint Bars
dishes.description: For a more grown-up taste, you can substitute dark chocolate chips for some or all of the semisweet chocolate chips in the glaze.

dishes.name: Lemon-Scented Blueberry Cupcakes
dishes.description: Studded with plump, juicy fresh berries, these cupcakes are fun for birthdays and special occasions.

dishes.name: Bourbon-Pecan Tart with Chocolate Drizzle
dishes.description: Pecan pie is often purely sweet with no undertones, but the bourbon, molasses, and chocolate in this beautiful centerpiece dessert all add complexity of flavor.

dishes.name: Raspberry-Rhubarb Pie
dishes.description: Sweet raspberries do that job perfectly here, while a splash of crème de cassis adds even deeper berry flavor.

dishes.name: Classic Fudge-Walnut Brownies
dishes.description: Large chocolate chunks create big, luxurious pockets of melty chocolate in the brownies, but you can always substitute chocolate chips.

dishes.name: Nathan’s Lemon Cake
dishes.description: Wonderful texture, assertive lemon flavor, just enough richness and just enough icing.

dishes.name: Blueberry-Peach Cobbler
dishes.description: Like a blueberry muffin canoodling with fresh peaches

dishes.name: Roasted Banana Bars with Browned Butter–Pecan Frosting
dishes.description: The bananas flavor the light-and-fluffy bars, which are topped with cream cheese icing and chopped pecans for the perfect amount of tanginess and crunch.
